{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question asks about the role of dental pulp in resorption of roots of primary teeth. This suggests that there is a connection between the root canal system and the resorption process. Furthermore, we see examples of unusual displacements of lower molars and maturation of residual tissue left in the jaw after injury, but none of these cases directly relate to the resorption of roots of primary teeth. We do have a case report about an odontoma preventing the eruption of a molar, but this does not seem relevant either.
